name: aws-cost-explorer
display_name: AWS Cost Explorer and Amazon Bedrock
description: Optimize your AWS spend (including Amazon Bedrock spend) with this MCP server by examining spend across regions, services, instance types and foundation models ([demo video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WuVOmYLRFmI&feature=youtu.be)).

examples.title: Get EC2 Spending
examples.description: Retrieve the EC2 spending data for the previous day.
examples.prompt: What was my EC2 spend yesterday?

examples.title: Analyze Spending
examples.description: Analyze spending by region for the past 14 days.
examples.prompt: Analyze my spending by region for the past 14 days.

examples.title: Show Top Services
examples.description: Show me my top 5 AWS services by cost for the last month.
examples.prompt: Show me my top 5 AWS services by cost for the last month.
